messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Emma: We’re tough because we battle
together!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Emma: That was awesome!
Are you maybe a Pokémon genius? You’re well deserving of respect!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
We won’t talk to people who have only
one Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_1:
Emma: When I battle with Lil,
we shouldn’t lose!
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Lil: We’re gonna crunch and
munch you all up!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Lil: We’re going to be super-strong
Trainers like you!I just decided now!
Please cheer for us!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
We don’t talk to people who have only
one Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_2:
Lil: You munched us all up last
time, but it’s our turn now!
